00002 <html><head>
00003 <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8">
00004 <title>Test - BigInteger.js</title>
00005 <script type='text/javascript' src='../../../wednus.js'></script>
00006 <script type='text/javascript'>
00007 // using debugging utilities
00008 W.module('debug'); // W.test, W.Timer, ...
00009 
00010 // (module/control inclusion)
00011 W.control('BigInteger');
00012 </script>
00013 
00014 
00015 <script type='text/javascript'>
00016 var timer = new W.Timer;
00017 timer.start();
00018 
00019 var MAX = 999999999999999;
00020 var BIG = '123456789123456789123456789123456789';
00021 
00022 {  // constructor tests
00023     var a = new W.BigInteger;
00024     W.test('0' == a, 'test default constructor');
00025     a = new W.BigInteger(12345);
00026     W.test('12345' == a, 'constructor w/ number argument');
00027     a = new W.BigInteger('12345');
00028     W.test('12345' == a, 'constructor w/ string argument');
00029 }
00030 
00031 {  // test loosing precision flag, 'lostPrecision'
00032     W.test(Math.pow(2, 53) == Math.pow(2, 53) + 1, "lostPrecition");
00033     var a = new W.BigInteger(MAX);
00034     W.test(!a.lostPrecision, 'loosing precision flag - 1');
00035     a = new W.BigInteger(MAX + 1);
00036     W.test(a.lostPrecision, 'loosing precision flag - 2');
00037 }
00038 { // test inequality
00039     var a = new W.BigInteger(12345);
00040     var b = new W.BigInteger(45678);
00041     W.test(!(a == b), 'inequality');
00042 }
00043 {  // test big number
00044     var a = new W.BigInteger(BIG);
00045     W.test(BIG == a, 'big number');
00046 }
00047 
00048 {  // test BigInterger::add
00049     var a = new W.BigInteger(1);
00050     W.test('2' == a.add(1), 'BigInterger::add - 1');
00051     var a = new W.BigInteger(123);
00052     W.test('124' == a.add(1), 'BigInterger::add - 2');
00053     var a = new W.BigInteger(MAX);
00054     W.test((MAX + 1 + '') ==  a.add(1), 'BigInterger::add - carry1');
00055     
00056     var a = new W.BigInteger(MAX);
00057     W.test((MAX + MAX + '') == a.add(MAX), 'BigInterger::add - carry2');
00058     
00059     a = new W.BigInteger(BIG);
00060     var result = '123456789123456789123456789123456790';
00061     W.test(result == a.add(1), 'BigInterger::add - 1');
00062 
00063     // teaser test
00064     a = new W.BigInteger(BIG);
00065     W.test('246913578246913578246913578246913578' == a.add(BIG),
00066       'BigInterger::add - 2');
00067     
00068     var a = new W.BigInteger(10);
00069     var temp = a.value();
00070     for(var i = 1; i < 10; ++i)
00071         a.add(temp);
00072     W.test('100' == a, 'BigInterger::add - 3');
00073     var a = new W.BigInteger(MAX);
00074     var temp = a.value();
00075     for(var i = 1; i <= 10; ++i)
00076         a.add(i);
00077     W.test('100' == a, 'BigInterger::add - 4');
00078 }
00079 
00080 {  // test BigInterger::mult
00081     var a = new W.BigInteger(MAX);
00082     W.test((MAX + MAX + MAX +'') == a.mul(3), 'BigInterger::mul - 1');
00083 
00084     function fact(base){
00085         var result = new W.BigInteger(1);
00086         for(var i = 1; i <= base; ++i)
00087             result.mul(i);
00088         return result;
00089     };
00090     //alert(fact(3));
00091     //alert(fact(20));
00092 }
00093 {  // test BigInterger::mult
00094     var a = new W.BigInteger(MAX);
00095     //alert(a.pow(2));
00096     W.test((MAX + MAX + MAX +'') == a.mul(3), 'BigInterger::mul - 2');
00097 }
00098 
00099 timer.finish();
00100 </script>
